The Rhinoceros Horn
“Having laid aside the rod with regard to all beings,
Not harming any of them,
One should not wish for a child, let alone a companion.
One should wander alone like the horn of a rhinoceros.”
“For one who has made connections, there are attachments;
From attachment, this suffering arises.
Seeing the danger that comes from attachment,
One should wander alone like the horn of a rhinoceros.”
